author: Staff Reporter
title: Covid19 | Stay indoors, avoid crowding, says Collector
description: Efforts were on to prevent crowding of customers at markets and at the same time ensure that essential commodities were accessible to the residents.
content:
In the wake of the outbreak of COVID-19 pandemic, residents must restrict themselves in coming outdoors and avoid visiting crowded places, said Collector T.G. Vinay here on Saturday.
The Collector, along with Corporation Commissioner S. Visakan, inspected th… [+1236 chars]
